Improve treatment of multiple bullets at once and calc_end_start_time()

First, we don’t need separate regexes in script since we check for
scope, so single regex per item is [supposed to be] fine for all bullets
types. Close #139
Second, since we have bullets with different length (1 or 3 chars), we
need to make sure that eol would be correct for calc_end_start_time(),
and since done tag may have or miss whitespace before date, need to make
sure that date would be parsed correctly

Reduce useless complexity in PlainTasksArchiveCommand
Use translate_tabs_to_spaces and tab_size to insert margins

Task bullet space added

`tasks_bullet_space` allows setting the bullet and margin space type.
This makes it possible to fully use of tabs instead of spaces. For
instance, The following configuration will work nicely in PlainTasks:
```json
{
	"tasks_bullet_space": "\t",
	"translate_tabs_to_spaces": false
}
```
Having a Tab as a separator allow the `done`, `cancelled` and `pending`
tasks to always align without "jumping" around when the state changes.
